item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Sri. ðŸ‘‹ I don’t really know how to best introduce myself, so here are some facts about me in no particular order: I was born in Mumbai, moved to the US about 10 years ago and have been living in the New England region since. I love traveling to new places and experiencing different cultures. I try to squeeze in a few trips every year whenever I can. In my free time, I like playing video games and watching TV shows.
